name: Monster Bullet Rush
description:
A beatable wave-based top down shooter. Shoot monsters and defeat bosses to defend the land. 

Gameplay
  • 3 weapons to use in battle: ak-57, pistol and axe
  • 20 waves
  • 3 maps
  • 3 (+1) boss fights, beat them all to achieve victory

Local multiplayer is supported, with up to 2 players (2 gamepads connected are required to play 2 player mode). 

Game autosaves after you've beaten each map, clear all 3 maps to unlock the final boss.

Controls (shown in-game)

Keyboard Controls

  • Movement: WASD
  • Dashing: Shift
  • Aiming and shooting: Mouse, Left mouse button
  • Switching weapons: Q / E

Gamepad Controls

*R2 and L2 buttons may not work on browser version. Therefore, the downloaded version is recommended when playing with a controller or 2 player mode.
